column4: I have a quick newb question for anyone willing to answer: What is TTY and what does it mean to switch TTY
what does flipping to a VT mean?
what's a ttys? sorry i'm new to unbuntu
it's basically a way to output stuff from the OS
wait, how i put myself on tty 1337 [e]Lement?
was a joke of course.  Haha
Out of curiousity, are most of you using Konversation or XChat for IRC ?
don't switch because of us...lol.  Such a follower.  We should have told him we used mIRC and messed with his head...lol
